MY_MYSQLDEFAULTPWD.__comment: This is the Password to which the migrated users will be set

MY_MYDBSELECTION.__comment: By Default the ALL means all databases but if you need specific specify value as :db1 db2 db3 -->to migrate db1,db2 and db3

MY_MYSELECTIONVALIDATE.__comment: Do you want to skip creation of Validation report (YES Or NO) Case Sensitive

MY_MYSELECTIONFIREWALLRULE.__comment: Do you want to skip Firewall Rule Migration (YES Or NO) Case Sensitive

MY_MYSELECTIONSERVERPARAMETER.__comment: Do you want to skip Server Parameter Migration (YES Or NO) Case Sensitive

MY_MYSELECTIONUSER.__comment: Do you want to skip Server USER Migration (YES Or NO) Case Sensitive

MY_MYSELECTIONROSTART.__comment: Do you want to skip setting the source server to Read only before you start migration

MY_MYSELECTIONROAFTER.__comment: Do you want to set the source server to read only for cutover after migration (NO will make the source server read-write again and there will be data discrepancy
